product_name: Patagonia Capilene 4 Expedition Weight Long Underwear Bottoms - Women's
long_description: A breathable base layer to keep you warm when it's really cold, the Capilene 4 Expedition Weight women's long underwear bottoms offer a cozy feel against skin with its soft heavyweight fabric. Open-grid brushed fleece interior warms your core, wicks moisture and rests smoothly against your skin. Details include a flat mesh-backed waistband for next-to-skin comfort and a gusseted crotch for full range of mobility. The Capilene 4 Expedition Weight women's long underwear bottoms feature Polygiene(R) permanent odor control to resist odors.
short_description: A breathable base layer to keep you warm when it's really cold, the Capilene 4 Expedition Weight women's long underwear bottoms offer a cozy feel against skin with its soft heavyweight fabric.
